title: Logan T360 Total Trimmer 60-inch
features: A multi-purpose tool capable of handling all sorts of material trimming jobs
Ideal for trimming a variety of of flexible or rigid materials up to 1/2" thick (13 mm).
description: A multi-purpose tool capable of handling all sorts of material trimming jobs. Ideal for flexible or rigid materials up to 1/2" thick. The T360 is a heavy-duty, base board mounted, all purpose trimmer using a single edge, reversible 0.12 razor blade. The blade holder features a 3-position depth setting that is adjusted by the twist of a knob. Other features include: 27" scaled squaring arm, 60" capacity, lifter bar mechanism, cutting head retracts after each use.
